VocoPro Silent PA Tour Guide Kit
The VocoPro SilentPA Tour Guide KIt is a multi-channel wireless listening system that is perfect for guided tours or field trips.
The set contains one transmitter with lavaliere microphone and 30 receivers with single mono earbud.

The Value of a Centre Degree
Centre graduates gain much more than a diploma. They become tomorrow’s leaders and innovators.

one of the nation’s top college values

. And Centre graduates gain much more than a diploma. They become tomorrow’s leaders and innovators, equipped with a broad-based liberal arts education, a global perspective, and a passion for making a positive difference in the world.
An outstanding academic reputation adds value to your degree. Centre is ranked
Personal attention from outstanding professors allows you to progress faster. Our
means your professors will know you by name—not as a number.

Our international study options broaden your perspective and give you a competitive advantage in the global economy. Centre is ranked among the top in the nation for percentage of students who study abroad. It might even help you join the 12 percent who find that first job in another country.
No. 1 in the nation for graduates happy with their college experience

Research shows that a college education is an investment that will pay you back over the course of your lifetime. That said, it’s important to be conscientious about student borrowing. The 56 percent of Centre students who take out loans to pay for their education graduate with less debt than the national average and virtually the same debt load as alumni of public universities in and around our state, as well as across the nation.
Your four years at Centre will be transformative and full of opportunity. The
guarantees that you will study abroad, have an internship or research experience, and graduate in four years—or Centre will provide up to another year tuition-free.
A Centre education is a lifelong investment. Our alumni see the benefits of their college experience well beyond their years on campus.
